potions.name: Health Potion
potions.effect: Heal 10% - 25% of the total user's health

potions.name: Strength Potion
potions.effect: Increase the attack damage from user up to 5% - 20%

potions.name: Invulnerability Potion
potions.effect: Makes the player takes no damage

potions.name: Armor Potion
potions.effect: Reduces the damage taken from enemies by 10% - 30%

potions.name: Explosive Potion
potions.effect: Inflicts 10% explosive damage of the total enemy's health on hit

potions.name: Resistance Potion
potions.effect: Reduce the damage taken from enemies by 5% - 10%
